metadata.title: CVE-2024-36464 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When exporting media types, the password is exported in the YAML in plaintext. This appears to be a best practices type issue and may have no actualimpact. The user would need to have permissions to access the media typesand therefore would be expected to have access to these passwords.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
